original_text: King Ahab told Jezebel about everything that Elijah had done. He told her how Elijah had killed all Baal's prophets with a sword. Kings 18 Kings 20
korean_text: 아합이 엘리야가 행한 모든 일과 그가 어떻게 모든 선지자를 칼로 죽였는지를 이세벨에게 말하니

sentences.original_text: King Ahab told Jezebel about everything
sentences.korean_translation: 아합 왕이 이세벨에게 모든 것을 알렸다

sentences.original_text: He told her how Elijah had killed
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이세벨에게 어떻게 엘리야가 죽였는지 알렸다

sentences.original_text: all Baal's prophets with a sword
